MarketingPage.description: Your habits are living flames. Tend them, fuel them, watch them grow.

hero.headline: Your habits, alive.
hero.subtitle: Flames. Fuel. AI. Rewards. One system that turns consistency into something you can see.
hero.notifyHint: Get notified when we launch. No spam, just sparks.

progression.headline: Habits that grow with you
progression.body: Eight stages. Wisp to Supernova. Every flame earns its evolution.

fuel.headline: Time is fuel
fuel.line2: Start a flame. Watch it burn.

ember.headline: This is Ember
ember.body: Your flame-sprite. She creates flames, organizes thoughts, and keeps you going.

ecosystem.headline: More than a habit tracker
ecosystem.sparksBody: The currency of effort. Sessions, streaks, and completed todos earn sparks — proof of work you can spend.
ecosystem.shopBody: Spend sparks on flame colors, card themes, and dashboard widgets. Effort unlocks upgrades.
ecosystem.notesBody: Capture thoughts and track tasks without leaving. Everything feeds back into your flames.
ecosystem.scienceBody: Every mechanic — streaks, progression, variable rewards — is informed by behavioral psychology.

whyHibana.headline: Why Hibana?
whyHibana.body1: Spark. In Japanese, hibana means spark.
